Grain.Do: Warm, grounding grains like cooked oats (1/2 cup), quinoa (1/2 cup), basmati rice (1/2 cup). Whole wheat roti (1-2 small).
Grain.Dont: Dry, light grains like puffed rice, large quantities of raw sprouts, undercooked grains.

Legume.Do: Cooked moong dal (1/2 cup), masoor dal (1/2 cup), split chickpeas (chana dal) (1/2 cup). Properly soaked and cooked red lentils (1/2 cup).
Legume.Dont: Dry, hard-to-digest legumes like whole chickpeas (chana), rajma (kidney beans), black beans in large amounts or without proper soaking and cooking.

Veg.Do: Cooked and warm root vegetables like sweet potato (1 cup), carrots (1 cup), beetroot (1 cup). Steamed zucchini (1 cup), pumpkin (1 cup), asparagus (1 cup).
Veg.Dont: Raw, cold, or bitter vegetables like raw broccoli, cauliflower, bell peppers, bitter gourd. Overly dry vegetables like dried mushrooms.

Spices.Do: Warming and digestive spices: ginger (1/2 tsp grated), cumin (1/4 tsp), coriander (1/4 tsp), turmeric (1/4 tsp), cardamom (pinch), cinnamon (pinch). Fennel seeds (pinch) after meals.
Spices.Dont: Overly pungent or heating spices in excess like dried red chili powder (use sparingly), black pepper (use moderately).

Leafy veg.Do: Cooked spinach (1 cup), kale (1 cup), swiss chard (1 cup) sautéed with ghee or oil. Lightly steamed methi (fenugreek leaves) (1 cup).
Leafy veg.Dont: Raw leafy greens, excessively bitter greens, large quantities of uncooked greens.

Oil.Do: Warm and nourishing oils: Ghee (1-2 tsp), sesame oil (1 tsp), almond oil (1 tsp). Use in cooking.
Oil.Dont: Cold, processed, or rancid oils. Excessive use of any oil, especially fried foods.

Fruits.Do: Sweet, ripe, and grounding fruits: ripe bananas (1 medium), cooked apples or pears (1 medium), berries (1/2 cup), mangoes (1/2 cup - in moderation due to sweetness).
Fruits.Dont: Raw, sour, or unripe fruits, dried fruits in large quantities, excessive citrus fruits (especially on an empty stomach).

Nuts and Dry fruits.Do: Soaked almonds (4-6), walnuts (2-3 halves), soaked and pitted dates (1-2).
Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Dry, roasted nuts in large quantities, unsoaked nuts, very dry fruits like raisins (use sparingly).

Milk product.Do: Warm, full-fat milk (1 cup) with digestive spices like cardamom or turmeric. Lassi (1 cup) made with yogurt and water, lightly sweetened. Small amounts of paneer (cottage cheese) (1/4 cup).
Milk product.Dont: Cold milk, sour yogurt, fermented dairy in excess, skimmed milk.

Condiments.Do: Fresh ginger chutney (small amount), mint chutney (small amount), light tamarind chutney (small amount). A pinch of rock salt (instead of table salt) in moderation.
Condiments.Dont: Excessive sour, spicy, or pungent condiments. Fermented or heavily processed condiments.
